data.name: Olava
data.notes_html:
OLAVA-garnet er oppkalt etter Camillas kjære bestemor og er laget av 50 % peruansk alpakka og 50 % highland-ull. Garnet er godt på pinnene, og gir et jevnt og fint maskebilde. OLAVA er et mykt og behagelig strikkegarn, som i tillegg funker like fint til både hekling og veving.

TIPS: OLAVA er perfekt i klassisk mønsterstrikk, fete aran-fletter, delikate hullmønster og alle typer enkle strukturer i rette og vrange masker. OLAVA er supert i samstrikk med Fnugg og Pihlros.

Lek med farger: Du finner Olava, Fnugg og Pihlros i like farger, så her kan du lett leke deg med å strikke dobbelt garn ton-i-ton, få effekter med forskjellig garn i striper og mønster – eller mikse farger for et nydelig, melert uttrykk.

Tips! CAMILLA PIHL OLAVA kan toves. Vær obs på at bleket, hvitt garn IKKE kan toves (naturhvitt er ikke bleket).

NB! STRIKKEFASTHETEN SOM ER OPPGITT PÅ BANDEROLEN ER KUN VEILEDENDE. HUSK AT DU ALLTID SKAL FØLGE STRIKKEFASTHETEN SOM ER OPPGITT I OPPSKRIFTEN.

Hver gang du kjøper Camilla Pihl-garn, støtter du Mirasolskolen i Peru.

data.name: Kos
data.notes_html: KOS er et mykt og lett alpakkagarn som passer til baby, barn og voksen. Perfekt til både små og store plagg. Garnet inneholder 62% baby alpakka, 9% ull og 29% nylon. Løpelengde pr. nøste (50gr) = ca 150 meter. Plagget må vaskes separat.

data.name: Fritidsgarn
data.notes_html:
The yarn is also sold in 100 g skeins in Scandinavia.

This yarn can be used for projects not intended for felting if washed according to manufacturer instructions.

Handwash using mild soap (neutral detergent). No bleach. Lay flat to dry
OR
Machine on Wool Program - 30 Degrees ( where this temperature also applies to rinse cycle)

It can also be used for felted items if these recommended wash temperatures are specifically exceeded.

data.name: Silk Mohair
data.notes_html:
This is NOT a superwash yarn.

Machine wash on a gentle wool cycle, low temperature. Use a wool detergent, no softener.

Handwash is recommended if washing machine don’t have a wool cycle.

Recommended gauge is large because of the halo;
it can be knit anywhere between a worsted and bulky gauge depending on how open you would like the fabric to be.

data.name: Mandarin Heklegarn
data.notes_html: Needle range: 1.25 - 1.5

data.name: DROPS Kid-Silk
data.notes_html:
A luxurious, light brushed yarn in an exclusive mix of 75% mohair super kid and 25% silk, DROPS Kid-Silk is feather light, and will give garments a sophisticated look, whether used alone or held together with other yarns.

Perfect for smaller garments such as shawls, shoulder warmers and feminine tops, DROPS Kid-Silk is available in a delicate colour palette that includes solids as well as long prints, in which the shade is created by a series of colours that repeat regularly in random long lengths.

Made in EU.

data.name: Sisu Print
data.notes_html:
Sisu Superwash
Sisu Superwash - 80% ullgarn, 20 % nylonforsterket. Superwashbehandlet som gjør dette velegnet til maskinvask. Behagelige plagg til inne og utendørs bruk for både barn og voksne. Barnas favoritt under parkdress og jakke. Slitesterke strømper i fine farge til hele familien. Garnet er superwash behandlet som gjør det spesielt velegnet til maskinvask. Anbefalt ullvaskemiddel: Milo. Vi anbefaler ikke bruk av mykningsmiddel på superwash behandlet garn.
50 gr = ca. 175 m

data.name: Mini Sterk
data.notes_html:
Mini Sterk is a thinner version of Sterk.

(Norwegian)
Mini Sterk er en tynnere utgave av Sterk som er et av våre mest populære garn. Velg Mini Sterk til samme typer plagg som Sterk. Flott til finkofter, skole- og barnehageklær, kjoler, skjørt, bukser, alle bruksplagg til store og små, sokker og tilbehør. Alle fargene i Mini Sterk finner du også i Sterk. Strikk for eksempel jakke i Sterk og skjørt eller bukser i Mini Sterk.

TIPS: Med alpakka-merino-miksen får du lunheten fra alpakkafiberen, merionoulla øker elastisiteten, og nylonforsterkningen gir et garn med god slitestyrke. Mini Sterk har samme strikkefasthet som Alpakka Wool, Fin og Tynn Alpakka og oppskriftene kan brukes om hverandre.

Hver gang du kjøper garn fra Du Store Alpakka støtter du Mirasolskolen i Peru.

data.name: Lille lerke
data.notes_html:
Handwash 40 degrees Celcius. Dry flat.

Håndvask 40 grader. Tørkes flatt.

“Lille Lerke er en tynnere utgave av vårt populære garn, Lerke. Lille Lerke er et deilig mykt garn spunnet av 53% fin merino ull og 47% egyptisk bomull, og egner seg spesielt godt til barn og babyplagg til bruk året rundt. Den fine blandingen av merino ull og bomull gjør Lille Lerke til et mykt og slitesterkt garn av høyeste kvalitet. “

data.name: Baby Ull
data.notes_html:
100% Pure New Wool

4 plies, S-twist
Made with combed Australian merino wool.

Washing Instructions for garments knitted in DALE BABY ULL
Turn garment inside out.
Machine wash: Use delicate setting (gentle spin cycle), cold water. Do not use fabric softener. Do not use dryer, but lay flat to dry on a towel as described below.
Hand wash: Dissolve a gentle detergent in water before washing Garment should be gently squeezed between the hands, not pulled up and down. Do not allow garment to soak. Rinse well. Remove excess water by using gentle spin cycle on the machine or by blotting with a towel. Lay flat on a towel to dry, maintaining original shape without excess stretching. Do not dry in direct sunlight/outdoor daylight or at a high temperature. Press lightly on reverse side if necessary using wool setting. Store knitted garments folded, not hanging.

Made in Norway

Dale Garn
AS 5721 Dalekvam
US/Canada:
Heart of the Mitten
312 S Elm Street
Owosso, MI 48867
989-723-5259
Fax 989-723-5255

data.name: Alpakka Silke
data.notes_html:
70% baby alpaca.

Machine wash on wool cycle, 30 degrees Celcius.
Low heat ironing.

data.name: PT5 Sport
data.notes_html: PT5 er et passelig tykt sportsgarn, mykt og supergodt å strikke med. Det består av 80% myk og god ull og 20% nylon. Garnet er spesielt motstandsdyktig på slitasjeutsatte områder som for eksempel hæl, tå og ankel på skistrømper, knær på bukser eller gensere som brukes mye under andre tekstiler. Nylonforsterkningen merkes ikke utover dette, og reduserer ikke den gode ullkvaliteten. Garnet er superwashbehandlet og kan vaskes i vaskemaskin.

data.name: Finull PT2
data.notes_html:
NOTE: Rauma has changed the label on this yarn. It is now labeled Finull PT2. Please link stash labeled PT2 to this yarn entry on Ravelry. There is no difference other than the labels. The original yarn is not discontinued, it just has a new name.

Original FinullGarn

This is what used to be referred to as a shetland weight yarn (it can be knit at a slightly looser gauge because it blooms after washing). It has a crisp hand and works well for stranded color designs. The yarn also softens up with washing.

Kardegarn av ren ny ull. Finull har størst fargespekter, og gir deilige lette og myke plagg ved flittig bruk. Det er godt å strikke av og egner seg godt til toving.

Finull er 2- trådet (og leveres i 50 g nøster i 1 kilos pakker.) Enkelte farger lagerføres på 1 kg spoler; vokset og renset. Egner seg godt til strikking og veving. Markert med x de fargene som levers i X-spoler.
1 nøste 50 g = ca 175 m
Strikkefasthet: 24-26 m = 10 cm
Strikkepinner: 2,5-3,5
Nm. 7/2
Velegnet til toving

data.name: Faerytale
data.notes_html: Not a true Aran weight if you go by meters per gram. This is a brushed alpaca so the halo fills in the holes.

data.name: DROPS Baby Merino
data.notes_html:
Although DROPS Baby Merino is listed as sport weight, this versatile yarn can easily be knit at a tighter gauge if preferred. Used as a sport weight yarn, the result is lofty and drapy, while used as a fingering weight yarn the knitted fabric is firmer and more dense.

You can buy this yarn from (per 50g skein):
3,45 EUR / 4,20 USD / 3,10 GBP / 34,00 NOK / 40,00 SEK / 31,00 DKK / 4,75 CHF / 96,00 CZK / 748,00 ISK / 14,70 PLN / 1121 HUF

You can also get DROPS Baby Merino at an even better price by checking for deals in your country! Enter its colour chart and choose your country under the yarn pictures to see all the discounts!

ABOUT THE YARN:
DROPS Baby Merino is spun from extra fine merino wool fibers from free-range animals in South America. A super soft and itch-free wool yarn, it is perfectly suited for delicate baby skin. The yarn is also superwash treated which makes it machine washable and ideal for daily use.

DROPS Baby Merino is spun from multiple thin strands, which gives the yarn extra elasticity. Is this special construction that makes it extra important to treat the garment right: make sure that you knit with the correct tension and rather use a tight tension than loose. Don’t wash your garment too warm, never leave it to soak and let the garment dry flat.

The yarn is cable spun, which means the stitches will be clearly defined, and the result achieved will be neat and even.

Made in the EU.

Oeko-Tex® certificate 25.3.0110

Find lots of free patterns for DROPS Baby Merino here!
Read more about the yarn here.

Find your DROPS store here!

data.name: Alpakka
data.notes_html:
Name on ballband is “Royal Alpakka”, but on dalegarn.com the name “Dale Alpakka” is used. Royal Alpakka has been replaced by Dale Alpakka

Dalegarn.com says in one place needle range is 3-4mm, but in two places that needle range is 3-3,5mm.

data.name: Alpakka Forte
data.notes_html:
Alpakka Forte is a reinforced alpaca yarn in 80% alpaca and 20% nylon that comes in beautiful heathered tones. The yarn is as soft and comfortable as pure alpaca, and the colors are especially beautiful in alpaca fish.

We recommend Alpakka Forte for sweaters, jackets, and skirts, and it’s wonderful for accessories including socks.

Alpakka Forte has the same running length and knitting strength as Dale Alpakka and Alpakka Space Dye, and can be used interchangeably with patterns calling for those yarns, which gives an enormous amount of room for playing with colors!

Gauge – 25 stitches per 4 inches on size 2-4 US needles
50 g/ball, approx 145 yards; hand wash, dry flat
80% alpaca/20% nylon

data.name: Sterk
data.notes_html: Delicious sockyarn from Du Store Alpakka.

data.name: Peer Gynt
data.notes_html:
This yarn previously came in 100 gm skeins in hanks. It now comes in 50 gram balls (and has for quite a while).

Meterage on 100 gram skeins is 180. Please adjust skein size and meters on individual stash pages.

data.name: Lanolin Wool
data.notes_html:
A new direction for Dale Garn, Lanolin Wool is 100% pure new wool, made in Italy. In 18 spectacular colors.

Lanolin helps wool retain its thermal insulating properties, even when wet. Normally it is removed when the wool is “scoured,” or washed, prior to dyeing. Lanolin Wool has this natural wool wax added back after dyeing. This makes it especially wonderful for garments that will be worn outdoors, such as jackets, ski sweaters, hats, mittens, gloves, and boot socks.

50g and approx 109 yards/ball
Suggested needle range 6-7 US
22-24 sts = 4″

data.name: Mandarin Naturell
data.notes_html:
Matte finish soft cotton yarn. Machine wash and dry warm.

NOTE: This is not the same as other “Mandarin” yarns. The yardage and gauge are different.

data.name: DROPS Merino Extra Fine
data.notes_html:
You can buy this yarn from (per 50g skein):
3,45 EUR / 4,20 USD / 3,10 GBP / 34,00 NOK / 40,00 SEK / 31,00 DKK / 4,75 CHF / 96,00 CZK / 748,00 ISK / 14,70 PLN / 1121 HUF

You can get DROPS Merino Extra Fine at an even better price by checking for deals in your country! Enter its colour chart and choose your country under the yarn pictures to see all the discounts!

ABOUT THE YARN:
DROPS Merino Extra Fine is cable spun from extra fine merino wool fibers from free-range animals in South America. Garments made in this yarn are very comfortable and have a great surface quality. This yarn is gentle on the skin and therefore great for baby and children garments.

Ideal for textured patterns such as cables and seed stitch, this yarn is superwash treated, which means it’s machine washable and suitable for everyday use.

DROPS Merino Extra Fine has both solid and mix colours - mix meaning that the wool is manufactured by carding the colours together before spinning, which gives the shade a mixed effect.

DROPS Merino Extra Fine is spun from multiple thin strands, which gives the yarn extra elasticity. It is this special construction that makes it extra important to treat the garment right. Make sure that you knit with the correct tension and use a tight tension rather than a loose one. Don’t wash your garment in water that is too warm and never leave it to soak. Let the garment dry flat.

Made in EU.

Oeko-Tex® certificate 25.3.0110

Find lots of free patterns for DROPS Merino Extra Fine here!

Read more about the yarn here.
Find your DROPS store here!

data.name: DROPS Lima
data.notes_html:
Meterage changed to 100 meters (109 yards) recently (2015/2016). Please change at stash level.

You can buy this yarn from (per 50g skein):
1,75 EUR / 2,75 USD / CAD / 1,55 GBP / 18,00 NOK / 20,00 SEK / 15,00 DKK / 2,35 CHF / 49,00 CZK / 385,00 ISK / 7,40 PLN / 569 HUF

You can also get DROPS Lima at an even better price by checking for deals in your country! Enter its colour chart and choose your country under the yarn pictures to see all the discounts!

ABOUT THE YARN:
DROPS Lima is a 4-strand sport yarn, the continuation of our bestseller DROPS Nepal. Made from 65% Peruvian Highland wool and 35% superfine alpaca, its fibers are untreated, which means that they are only washed and not exposed to any chemical treatment prior to dyeing. This highlights the fibers’ natural properties, while it provides also a better shape and texture quality.

DROPS Lima is perfect for outdoor garments like classic Norwegian sweaters and sportswear, that are usually knitted tight for good shape stability. Hard wearing and durable like any great wool yarn should be, it has also the lovely properties from the alpaca, being soft and comfortable. A sport yarn with a touch of luxury!

DROPS Lima contains mixed colours, this means the wool is manufactured by carding the colours together before spinning, which gives it a mixed effect.

Made in Peru.

Find a lot of free patterns for DROPS Lima here!

More about the yarn
Find your DROPS store here!

“Kommer med oppskrift på 3 forskjellige fremgangsmåter å strikke pledd på inne i banderolen.

Viking Pleddgarn er et mykt og godt garn som i utgangspunktet er laget til pledd, men som egner seg like godt til både plagg og tilbehør.

Garnet blir levert i 350 gram store nøster, og 1 nøste er nok til et pledd.“

data.name: DROPS Nepal
data.notes_html:
You can buy this yarn from (per 50g skein):
1,75 EUR / 2,75 USD / CAD / 1,55 GBP / 18,00 NOK / 20,00 SEK / 15,00 DKK / 2,35 CHF / 49,00 CZK / 385,00 ISK / 7,40 PLN / 569 HUF

You can also get DROPS Nepal at an even better price by checking for deals in your country! Enter its colour chart and choose your country under the yarn pictures to see all the discounts!

ABOUT THE YARN:
DROPS Nepal is a lovely, chunky and luxurious yarn spun in 35% superfine alpaca and 65% Peruvian Highland wool, a mix that accentuates the softness of alpaca while the wool contributes to the garments’ shape stability. Both fibers are untreated, which means that they are only washed and not exposed to any chemical treatment prior to the dyeing. This highlights the fibers’ natural properties, providing also a better shape and texture qualities.

Spun from 3 strands, which gives an exciting and rustic stitch definition, DROPS Nepal is an easily knitted/crocheted quality which is also ideal for felting, resulting in garments that have an even and soft surface.

DROPS Nepal contains mixed colors; this means the wool is manufactured by carding the colors together before spinning, which gives it a mixed effect. Labels say Nepal Mix.

Made in Peru.

Find lots of free patterns for DROPS Nepal here!

Read more about the yarn
Find your DROPS store here!

data.name: DROPS Air
data.notes_html:
You can buy this yarn from (per 50g skein):
3,70 EUR / 4,60 USD / 3,20 CAD / GBP / 38,00 NOK / 41,00 SEK / 32,00 DKK / 5,10 CHF / 103,00 CZK / 832,00 ISK / 15,80 PLN / 1206 HUF

You can also get DROPS Air at an even better price by checking for deals in your country! Enter its colour chart and choose your country under the yarn pictures to see all the discounts!

ABOUT THE YARN:
A new and exciting “blow yarn” made from soft baby alpaca and cozy and warm merino wool. Its construction is unique, based on the newest yarn technologies, where instead of spinning, the fibers of baby alpaca and merino wool are air blown into a tube, which makes the garments made in this yarn about 30-35% lighter than those made with conventional spun yarns of the same thickness.

DROPS Air is - as its name says - a very airy yarn that feels wonderful against the skin, which makes it perfect for accessories, shawls, sweaters and jackets in both textured and cable patterns. Garments made in DROPS Air are totally itch-free, which means everyone can wear them!

Find lots of free patterns for DROPS Air here!

More about the yarn
Find your DROPS store here!
